title: [East Guardtower]
description: The guardtower has been built from blocks of rock and mortar, creating a strong barrier against intruders.  The angled roof has been tiled in a bright terra cotta which reflects the moonlight and appears a muted mauve in the night.

The guardtower has been built from blocks of rock and mortar, creating a strong barrier against intruders.  The angled roof has been tiled in a bright terra cotta which reflects the sunlight and appears almost on fire.
